summary.span: 包含可用于为对象和字段自定义 SOAP 的生成和处理的类和特性。

span.span: Contains classes and attributes that can be used to customize generation and processing of SOAP for objects and fields.

summary.span: 该命名空间的类可用于指示 SOAPAction 标头字段、类型输出、XML 元素名称和方法 XML 命名空间 URI。

span.span: The classes of this namespace can be used to indicate the SOAPAction header field, type output, XML element name, and the method XML namespace URI.

summary.span: 在 SOAP 生成期间，该信息由 SOAP 序列化程序使用；而在 Web Services 描述语言 (WSDL) 生成期间，该信息由 Soapsuds 工具 (Soapsuds.exe) 使用。

span.span: This information is used by the SOAP serializer during SOAP generation and the Soapsuds Tool (Soapsuds.exe) during Web Services Description Language (WSDL) generation.

summary.span: 由该命名空间中的特性指定的信息可在生成的 SOAP 的接收端使用，以自定义远程方法调用和对象的处理。

span.span: The information specified by the attributes in this namespace can be used on the receiving end of the generated SOAP to customize processing of the remoted method calls and objects.

summary.span: 命名空间最重要的类之一是 类。

span.span: One of the most important classes of the namespace is class.

summary.span: 该 类是非功能性的，并且只能用作所有元数据属性的基类。

span.span: The class is nonfunctional, and can only be used as the base class for all the metadata attributes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关 SOAPAction HTTP 标头字段的详细信息，请参阅 W3C 规范的 [SOAPACTION Http 标头字段](https://www.w3.org/TR/2000/NOTE-SOAP-20000508/#_Toc478383528) 部分。For more information on the SOAPAction HTTP header field, see [The SOAPAction HTTP Header Field](https://www.w3.org/TR/2000/NOTE-SOAP-20000508/#_Toc478383528) section of the W3C specification.
